content: this is a beginner-friendly pattern to make super cute plush potion bottles perfect for halloween decor **materials needed ** worsted weight yarn size 4 in the colors of your choice polyester fiber fill 3 75mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers pins **abbreviations ** magic_ring- magic_ring st- stitch single_crochet- single_crochet increase- increase single_crochet twice in one stitch decrease- decrease single_crochet two stitches together blo- single_crochet in back loops only flo- single_crochet in front loops only
